DOC.criteria: informed consent ACS ( acute coronary syndrome ) Group : angiographic coronary artery disease ; acute coronary syndrome , define EITHER unstable angina pectoris significant coronary stenosis ( troponin negative , without significant STelevation ) OR lowrisk NSTEMI ( Troponin positive , without significant STelevation ) stable CADGroup : angiographic coronary artery disease ; acute coronary syndrome within last 3 month healthy control group : No clinical angiographical sign apparent atherosclerosis acute inflammation ( CRP > 1 mg/dl , leukocyte > 11.000/Âµl ) malignant diseases pregnancy medication NOdonors ( e.g.isosorbide mononitrate , isosorbide dinitrate , glyceryl trinitrate , Molsidomin , Ranexa ) patient STEMI highrisk NSTEMI
